To classics of PC Gamin : Portal and Portal 2 must HAVE !!
Hallucinant.

Portal 2 takes place in a very advanced science research facility, where the game's main point are "tests" (which are puzzles). In this game, the puzzles are difficult and in some cases, very hard to solve. The game isn't all about puzzles, however. A part of the game is the universe and the atmosphere, where Valve has given a great amount of depth into the game, but not so much that you can't interpret meanings behind the story. The game has a rich story and the graphics are still great, even after all these years (please Valve count to 3). This game is fascinating and all the puzzles will make your brain hurt, and sometimes make you want to rip your hair out. If you have not played Portal or seen it, please buy it. Although not necessary, playing Portal 1 will make your experience in this game more enjoyable. 

All in all, 
10/10

I just finished Portal 2 for the third time.
I still haven't had enough of it.

This game is probably the best Puzzle/Adventure games I have ever played. The storyline, much like other Singleplayer Story-Driven Valve games is very well written, and very easy to get into. On a side note, The story from the first installment of Portal does not connect to the start of Portal 2, unfortunately. The game is a bit frustrating at times, but you have to think everything through...or just look up a solution on YouTube. The characters of this game are amazingly placed in the story. No spoilers ahead, but the ending is definitely something you'd never expect. Make sure that if you have a friend who is interested in this game, maybe play the Co-op. I have played the Co-op with a friend, and that was just as good as the singleplayer. Bottomline, this game is a Classic that you've heard of for a long time...hopefully. You'll love it as long as you keep an open mind, and do not give up when it becomes difficult to figure out. I bet you that you will love this game.
Best puzzle game in existance. Beautiful, fun, witty, and great presentation. This is the Half-Life of puzzle games.
Very , very good game , hard like hell but i like it !!!!
i wish i had a portal gun

I have spent quite a bit of time in this game, my time spent offline isn't shown, but ive probably played this game offline about 60% of the time, I at least have 100 hours in! With every game, however there are pros and cons, but I promise the good things far outweigh the bad things.

[b]Pros[b/]
Amazing story and character development!
Awesome puzzles to have you stumped for hours!
You can create your own puzzles, and play others custom puzzles online!
Portals! (duh)

[b]Cons[b/]
Not very good replayability (I have replayed it at least 10 times nonetheless...)
The Co-op isn't very fun unless you have a friend to play with yourself, and even then only if you can get it working...

I highly reccomend this game, and if you are thinking about buying it, do so! You will not regret it!

Incredible game with puzzles to really make you think outside the box. Fun both single and with a friend. But really messing with your friend by jumping into an infinite fall portal is the real fun.

At this series Portal 2 tell more about Aperture Science, the company behind Portal experiments, and show even more why the experiments go wrong because of Glados (artificial intelligence), done unintentionally by the laboratory.

When you start play, was like Portal one. You wake up and don't know where you where and how you get there. After find a way out of that place you get inside the Aperture Laboratories that was destroyed by Glados, and get deeper and deeper inside the game to find why did she kill every person and make her the only survivor experiment and reproduce lots of machines as herself.

This scenario start inside a house made to project the real world, when you break the cocoon, you see a jungle and the capsules broked. You find a portal weapon and a hole inside the laboratories and start digging up everything to get knowledge about what happened with other people wich was with you. For this you need pass through the challengs the game make you do and survive every single one.

I tag this game as creepy, because he is a little dark and alone game. This game doesn't scary you but the scenario was made by it. Is really dark and lots of challenges made for you uncover and get know more and more about the history.

The graphics is really good and audio too, you can also run this even in a "Potato". An inside game joke.

I do recommend 100% this game. I really love Portal series. Hope they keep going and make more continuations, because is fun playable and know more about what happened to the future.
